required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Assess Tolerability, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of a New Drug
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I, Monocentric, Double-blind, Randomized Study to Assess Tolerability, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of ACH15 After Single Dose and Multiple Doses in Healthy Male Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is evaluate the safety and tolerability parameters regarding the new drug in healthy men and evaluate the pharmacokinetics parameters after one dose and multiple doses of the new drug.

primary_outcome.description: Blood analysis to evaluate drug pharmacokinetics at Group 1 to 5: 30 minutes and 05 minutes before dose and 00h10 min, 00h15 min, 00h30 min, 00h45 min, 01h, 01h15min, 01h30min, 01h45min, 02h, 02h15min, 02h30min, 02h45min, 03h, 03h15min, 03h30min, 03h45min, 04 h, 04h15min, 04h30min, 04h45min, 05h, 05h30min, 06 h, 08 h, 10 h, 12h, 16h, 24 h e 48hours post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: High digestive endoscopy (participants included at Group 6)
primary_outcome.description: Image exam to evaluate the drug safety
Blood will be collected to evaluate the drug safety by analysis of biochemical profile

Blood analysis to evaluate drug pharmacokinetics at Group 6:00:30 min before dose, 00h20min, 00h40min, 01h, 01h15min, 01h30min, 01h45min, 02h, 02h15min, 02h30min, 02h45min, 03h, 03h15min, 03h30min, 03h45min, 04h, 04h15min, 04h30min, 04h45min, 05h, 05h30min, 06h, 08h, 10h, 12h, 14h, 18h, 24h, 26h, 30h, 36h, 38h, 42h, 48h, 50h, 54h, 60h, 62h, 66h, 72h, 74h, 78h, 84h, 86h, 90h, 96h, 98h, 102h, 108h, 110h, 114h, 120h, 122h, 126h, 132h, 134h, 138h, 144h, 146h, 150h, 156h, 158h, 162h, 168h, 174h, 180h e 192h post-dose.

Placebo 500mg capsule by mouth, four 500 mg capsules once as a single dose(Group 5)
